name: protector
effect: Held by Rhydon: Evolves the holder into Rhyperior when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Rhydon: Holder evolves into Rhyperior.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.platinum: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
